column4: If I have /home/ mounted on another partition, is 4GB (for /) enough space for a Ubuntu system?
if you keep it slim it will be enough..but it's a bit on the small side
yeah, just got this EEE PC here and am wondering if the 4GB SSD is faster than the 16GB SSD. It has two internal it turns out.
ah..I have no doubt you can squeeze in an ubuntu install on those 4GB.. but you won't have much space left over
